node.background: Colorado Secretary of State Jena Griswold publicly sparred with Trump over mail voting when Trump suggested his supporters in North Carolina vote twice -- once by mail and once in person, which is illegal. Griwsold threatened to refer Trump for prosecution if double voting occurred in Colorado. The Centennial State is widely recognized as a leader in mail voting, a system it has had in place since 2013.
node.questionText: Do you support mail ballot voting like Coloradoâ€™s system?
